features: ➤【WiMiUS Newest Auto Focus & Auto 6D Keystone Correction】Instead of fussy and repetitive manual adjustments, P64 smart projector is equipped with auto-focus and auto-keystone system to ensure that whether you are projecting at an oblique angle or bumping the projector accidentally, the projected image is as sharp as possible automatically without you having to focus the lens yourself. Easy to Operate/Faster Setup Time/Increased Productivity/Reducing Eye Strain.

➤【Native 1080P & 4K Supported 】Compared to its predecessors, P64 movie projector with higher lumens & contrast ratio 20000:1 delivers much higher brightness and wider color gamut resulting in a massive increase in color volume. Native 1080P & 4K video support, restoring full video quality with excellent shadow detail. P64 will give you a home theater experience and also is a great option for you to enjoy outdoor movie nights or sports nights, or final-season nights.

➤【No latency Ultra-fast WiFi 6 & Two-way Bluetooth 5.2】P64 WiFi projector uses industry-leading WiFi 6 technology, the transmission is faster and more stable, enjoy a smooth viewing and gaming experience! Especially when you play on Xbox, Switch, PS5, and more! The P64 Bluetooth projector supports two-way transmission, which can be connected to mobile devices and used as a Bluetooth speaker. In addition, equipped with 12W Hi-Fi speakers giving you a sense of immersion.

➤【Touch Screen & 300-inch Large Screen & 50% Zoom Function】 The home projector adopts an elegant smart touch screen design, allowing you to adjust them with confidence even in dark environments. With the zoom function, the image size can be reduced from 100% to 50% without having to move the projector. The adjustable 40”-300” screen also gives you the freedom to customize your screen size to fit any space. It can be easily mounted on a stand mount or hung from the ceiling.

➤【Fully Sealed Engine & Multi-device Connection】P64 is designed based on a fully sealed optical core, which is not easy to enter dust, effectively reducing screen black spots and image quality loss. Equipped with HDMI*2/USB*2/AV/audio ports, it can easily connect Phone/PC/TV Stick/Switch. Any questions, please feel free to contact us via after-sales email, WiMiUS promises 24/7 Service, 2-year Money Back, 3-year Repair, and Lifetime Technical Support.

How can I stream Netflix or YouTube content on my projector? Due to High-brandwidth Digital Content Protection, all LCD Projectors do not support wireless mirroring contents from Netflix, Hulu, Disney etc. Please insert a Roku or Amazon Fire TV Stick (Not Included) into our projector. What should I do if I have video but no audio on my projector? Dolby Sound is not supported, please turn off any Dolby sound settings on your connected devices or Apps. Could you provide guidance on utilizing the auto-focus function effectively? 1. Place the projector in line with the center of the screen. Or the offset angle should be within 20°. 2. Omnidirectional Automatic Correction or Manual Keystone to adjust the screen to rectangular. 3. Auto Focus or Manual Focus to adjust lens focus Why am I encountering a black screen when wirelessly mirroring my phone to the projector? Due to different versions of mobile phones, please turn on or off the bottom option "HDCP" in WiFi settings of projector. What is the process for adjusting the projector's brightness levels? While playing videos via HDMI, press the menu key of remote, then you will see the image settings, where the brightness, etc can be adjusted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector with excellent features for a reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been using a WiMiUS projector for a while and everyone in my family loves its quality. One feature it lacks is auto focus and auto keystone correction. So, when I saw the latest projector from WiMiUS with those features and even better specifications for around the same price point, I purchased it and I am so glad I did because so far it has delivered everything it has promised. The projector arrived on time in a secure package and it comes with a nice carry-on bag. I have set it up in my media room and you can see its picture and sound quality from the pictures and video I have posted. Overall, it is a great product and I am very happy with the purchase.Pros:- The picture is so clear and bright even when the light is on!- The sound quality is very good for this price.- The setup is so easy and straightforward.- Connecting to the Wi-Fi was super easy and fast.- Whenever I turn the projector on or change its position, it auto-focuses which is amazing. If it doesn’t get the right focus, you can easily set the focus just using the remote!- Keystone correction was perfect. You can setup the projector anywhere in the room and the picture will still fit the screen. I have not used the auto keystone correction yet.- The projector works really well with Amazon fire stick.- The settings to adjust the brightness, contrast, etc are very user friendly although the settings were perfect just out of the box.Cons:- I can’t think of any for this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High end projector at low cost !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I decided to buy a projector as an alternate to a secondary TV and got this option as one of Amazon's top seller. The delivery was super quick and the product build is of high quality. I have been using it for about 10 days now and the picture clarity is very impressive. It has a native 1080p display and supports upto 4k. I use a roku device to stream content and they automatically upscale to 4k on the projector with high quality. One of the best feature is the ability to autofocus and auto-adjust keystone. I have my projector project the image in a slant angle and the projector does a wonderful job of getting a 100" rectangular image with good focus. The speakers are also of high quality and I barely noticed any sound distortion at high volume. Also, the projector light is bright enough that it can also be used during the day with the curtains on. Overall, the projector is a great alternative to a big TV at a fraction of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great projector
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this projector! It's bright enough to watch during the day and the picture quality is good - not good enough to be used as a second monitor and read things clearly, but I wasn't expecting that (thought I'd try, though!). For movie use it's perfect. I have kind of an odd set up in a small-ish room, so it's up pretty high, tilted down at a rather small screen. Fortunately the zoom function gives a very wide range of projection sizes and the keystone allows me to get it square on the screen from a pretty awkward angle. That's exactly what I needed! It's not perfectly focused throughout the picture because of the fairly extreme keystone correction, but it's not so unfocused anywhere that you'd notice unless reading small text. Very impressive for the angle I'm using.The speaker is quite good for a built-in. The auto-focus works really well when projecting at a larger size, but struggles with all the corrections I'm using, but it's very easy to manually focus. The auto-keystone also works well up to a point that I've surpassed, but the manual keystone is also very easy to use. I've got a Chromecast attached; the Chromecast remote won't program to this unit but otherwise it works as expected.I love that it doesn't get hot at all and the fan is pretty quiet. All in all, a very good projector, exactly what I was hoping for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up with HDMI cable and with wireless connection. It was really cool to see it self adjust to the wall by itself and autocorrect when you first set up. The image is a whole lot better than expected, it looked great on the wall! I had it stacked on a shelf but it also has the hardware to be screwed on the ceiling. It comes with a control so you can self adjust the screen and play with other settings. I love it! I can't wait to use to play super smash bros with my friends on it! Definitely reccomend if you wanna have a cute date night or a game night. It can also connect to Bluetooth speakers, though the sound on the projector itself is pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Wimius projector is an absolute marvel. Its picture quality is breathtaking, with vibrant colors and crystal-clear details. The brightness is exceptional, ensuring a captivating viewing experience even in well-lit rooms. The versatile connectivity options allow for seamless integration with various devices. The audio quality is immersive and the compact design makes it easy to set up anywhere. This projector is a true gem, delivering a top-tier home cinema experience.

The media could not be loaded. Después de buscar por un tiempo un buen proyector para ver películas y series en casa, me decidí a comprar el Proyector 5G WiFi Bluetooth Full HD 1080P. Y la verdad es que estoy muy satisfecho con mi compra. La calidad de imagen es muy buena y los colores son vibrantes y detallados. Además, la conectividad WiFi y Bluetooth es muy fácil y rápida de usar.Los altavoces incorporados también son una gran ventaja, el sonido es envolvente y me hace sentir como si estuviera en el cine. La portabilidad del proyector es otra gran ventaja, puedo llevarlo conmigo a cualquier lugar y disfrutar de mis películas favoritas en cualquier momento.Además de su impresionante calidad de imagen, el Proyector 5G WiFi Bluetooth Full HD 1080P también cuenta con conectividad WiFi y Bluetooth, lo que te permite transmitir contenido directamente desde tu smartphone o tablet, así como desde otros dispositivos de transmisión. También cuenta con puertos HDMI, USB y AV, lo que te permite conectar una amplia variedad de dispositivos para reproducir tus contenidos favoritos.La calidad de construcción del proyector es impresionante, con una carcasa resistente que protege los componentes internos y un ventilador silencioso que mantiene el proyector fresco durante el uso prolongado.Por otro lado, la configuración del proyector es muy sencilla y la interfaz es fácil de usar. Puedo conectar mis dispositivos móviles, portátiles y consolas de juegos sin ningún problema.En conclusión, si estás buscando un proyector de cine en casa de buena calidad, fácil de usar y portátil, definitivamente deberías considerar el Proyector 5G WiFi Bluetooth Full HD 1080P. Es una gran inversión para cualquier amante del cine en casa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Projector over TV from now on.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently bought this projector, and I it has completely changed the way I enjoy movies at home. I was pleasantly surprised by how easy and fantastic this projector is.First of all the projector displays movies in full HD, and it's like having a mini theater right in my living room. The colors are so vivid, and the image is super clear. I never realized how much detail I was missing out on with my old TV until I experienced the sharpness and clarity with the pictures this projector puts out, especially since the screen size is so much bigger.Setting it up was a piece of cake. I was worried it would be complicated, but it wasn't at all. I just plugged it in, connected my Fire TV stick with the HDMI cable (which was included, thank goodness!), and voila! Movie time! The remote control is straightforward, and the menu is easy to navigate. I didn't need to be a tech genius to figure it out.But what really impressed me is that I can use it for more than just movies. I connected my kids gaming console, and he had a blast playing his favorite games on the big screen. It felt like he was in the game! The projector supports different devices, so I can even connect my laptop.Now, I should mention that the built-in speakers are decent. They're good enough for everyday use, but if you want that real movie theater experience, I'd recommend hooking up some external speakers or a soundbar. I connected my old speakers, and the sound was fantastic!Overall, I'm thrilled with this projector. It has made my movie nights so much more enjoyable, and I feel like I'm getting more value out of my entertainment setup. If, like me, you're not a tech expert but still want an incredible movie experience, I highly recommend giving this Projector a try. It's been a game-changer for me, and I'm sure it'll be for you too!

The media could not be loaded. Este proyector LED Wimius Full HD 1080 con soporte 4k con wifi y Bluetooth es una muy buena opción si tenéis un presupuesto ajustado y queréis conseguir una calidad de imagen más que buena. Los colores que proyecta son coloridos y potentes.Tiene un aspecto, acabado y diseño muy buenos. Y además, se integra muy bien en la decoración del salón.Me gusta mucho simular mi propio cine en casa con él. Cuanto más separas el proyector de la pared, más grande se ve la imagen, consiguiendo una pantalla muy grande, de hasta unas 300 pulgadas, aproximadamente.Lleva incorporado un altavoz que se oye bastante bien y además tiene conectividad Bluetooth con la que puedes enlazar un altavoz o auriculares bluetooth. A mí me gusta poner un altavoz bluetooth debajo de la pantalla para que parezca que el sonido viene desde la parte frontal. Y si queréis probar a ver una buena película con este proyector y unos buenos cascos bluetooth, disfrutaréis a lo grande sin molestar a nadie.Además, desde su puerto USB podemos ver sin necesidad de un ordenador:- Fotografías.- Videos.- Documentos Word, PDF, PPT y Excel desde una memoria USB.Y mediante la conexión wifi, se puede duplicar la pantalla del teléfono o tablet, ya sea con Android o con iOS.También es posible enlazar un ordenador o cualquier dispositivo que se pueda conectar por cable HDMI porque tiene dos entradas HDMI. Como por ejemplo, un Fire TV stick de Amazon, un Chromecast o incluso la PS4.En cuanto a los ajustes, Wimius facilita muchas opciones.Puede elegir entre muchos idiomas para el menú. Entre ellos: español, inglés…Tiene una rueda lateral al lado de la lente que permite enfocar fácilmente la imagen. Además, si entras en el menú, puedes ajustar el ángulo de las cuatro esquinas y esto facilita mucho el poder colocar el proyector donde quieras.También dispone de una función zoom que permite disminuir la imagen a tu gusto hasta un 50%. A mí me va genial cuando quiero que la pantalla sea más pequeña o si no tengo espacio para separar el proyector de la pared.Con estos ajustes tienes la posibilidad de conseguir una gran calidad de proyección en diferentes lugares.Yo lo tengo a unos 5 metros de distancia y funciona genial.Debo añadir que también tiene una buena potencia de luz, por lo que no es necesario estar totalmente a oscuras para ver bien las películas. Yo lo utilizo por las tardes y no es necesario oscurecer mucho la sala.En verano lo utilizo como cine de verano en la terraza y mis hijos disfrutan mucho.Este proyector tiene un buen tamaño y pesa muy poco. Con la bolsa de transporte que se adjunta en la compra lo tenéis muy fácil para llevar el proyector donde queráis.Además el proyector va acompañado de un mando, que va muy bien y es de fácil manejo, un cable HDMI y un cable AV.Por su precio, es una muy buena elección.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with my recent purchase of the projector. First and foremost, the projection brightness is absolutely fantastic, ensuring vivid and vibrant visuals that truly bring my content to life. The picture quality is top-notch, delivering a true HD level experience with impeccable clarity and stunning detail. I am also delighted with the smooth video playback, as it creates a truly immersive viewing experience. The portability of this projector is remarkable, allowing me to effortlessly take it anywhere I desire. It fits perfectly on the projection stand at home, providing a convenient and stable setup for my movie nights. Additionally, the wall mounting process was a breeze, making it easy to find the ideal placement in any room. Overall, this projector has exceeded my expectations in terms of brightness, picture quality, smoothness, portability, and ease of setup. I couldn't be happier with my purchase and highly recommend it to fellow projector enthusiasts
